name: Oateo Steel Cut Oats
description: Delectably nutty and chewy, OATEO Steel Cut Oats are a healthier form of oats. This bowl of oats is low on Glycemic Index and is an excellent substitute to rice as it is rich in fibre and contains fewer calories. Steel cut oats are produced by cutting oat grains into 2 or 3 pieces with the help of a steel blade. Charge Up with Oateo Steel Cut and awaken the inner superhero Captain America -energy in you.*Images for illustration purposes only.Product received may vary.
